    description => string (722) "Stay in the heart of Tokyo. Located in Tokyo, 656 feet from Shimmichi Shoppi...
    $value[1]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Tokyo.
Located in Tokyo, 656 feet from Shimmichi Shopping Street and 1312 feet from Atre Yotsuya, Oval Tokyo Yotsuya 601 provides accommodations with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property has city views and is 1640 feet from Former Futabatei Shimei House Monument and 1640 feet from Wakaba Higashi Park.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sotobori Park, Akasaka Palace and Minamimotomachi Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 9.3 mi from Oval Tokyo Yotsuya 601.

    description => string (923) "Stay in the heart of Tokyo. Ideally located in the Shinjuku Ward district of...
    $value[4]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Tokyo.
Ideally located in the Shinjuku Ward district of Tokyo, Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya is located 328 feet from Shimmichi Shopping Street, 1640 feet from Shinjuku Historical Museum and 1640 feet from Atre Yotsuya. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi. The property is close to popular attractions like Sotobori Park, Minamimotomachi Park and Saikabo Kimchi Museum.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. All rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV.

Guests at Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodations include Former Futabatei Shimei House Monument, Wakaba Higashi Park and Oiwa Mizukake Kannon. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 9.3 mi from Hotel Keihan Tokyo Yotsuya.

    description => string (847) "Stay in the heart of Tokyo. Conveniently located 3 minutes by foot from JR Y...
    $value[5]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Tokyo.
Conveniently located 3 minutes by foot from JR Yotsuya Railway Station, Tokyu Stay Yotsuya offers well-appointed accommodations with a kitchenette. Guests can use free Wi-Fi at the entire property.

Rooms at Tokyu Stay are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a private washing machine. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, a fridge and an electric kettle. Kitchenware is also provided and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. Nightwear and slippers are offered for all guests.

Dry cleaning, photocopying and courier services are available at the 24-hours front desk. Free luggage storage is provided as well.

Yotsuya Tokyu Stay is a 5-minute train ride from Shinjuku and a 10-minute train ride from Tokyo Station. Shibuya can be reached in 12-minutes by train.

    description => string (823) "Stay in the heart of Tokyo. Right in the center of Tokyo, located within a s...
    $value[6]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Tokyo.
Right in the center of Tokyo, located within a short distance of Shimmichi Shopping Street and Oiwa Mizukake Kannon, MYK Yotsuya 2chome 302 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and kettle. This apartment is less than 0.6 mi from Wakaba Higashi Park and a 12-minute walk from Saikabo Kimchi Museum.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in this accommodations.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Shinjuku Historical Museum, Atre Yotsuya and Former Futabatei Shimei House Monument. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 9.3 mi from MYK Yotsuya 2chome 302.

* Retrieve the path component of the URI.

* The path can either be empty or absolute (starting with a slash) or
* rootless (not starting with a slash). Implementations MUST support all
* three syntaxes.
*
* Normally, the empty path "" and absolute path "/" are considered equal as
* defined in RFC 7230 Section 2.7.3. But this method MUST NOT automatically
* do this normalization because in contexts with a trimmed base path, e.g.
* the front controller, this difference becomes significant. It's the task
* of the user to handle both "" and "/".
*
* The value returned MUST be percent-encoded, but MUST NOT double-encode
* any characters. To determine what characters to encode, please refer to
* RFC 3986, Sections 2 and 3.3.
*

* delimiter between path segments, that value MUST be passed in encoded
